snippet.title: Super Dram World - Part 1
snippet.description:
Super Dram World is a Kaizo inspired hack created by PangaeaPanga and overall it's really solid. Like any good Kaizo, the obstacles are fairly designed to challenge your timing and control mastery (or at least after you know where all the hidden blocks and trolls are.)

The .ips is available here: https://www.smwcentral.net/?p=section&a=details&id=11374

In this video, I complete the first five levels that make up the starting overworld screen. Jumping into an SMW hack after playing a lot of Mario Maker feels pretty weird, but I eventually adjust to the starkly different physics. None of these levels took too long to beat, but things will ramp up soon I'm sure.

Enjoy!
